problems.title: Find Next Prime Number
problems.description:
You are given a positive integer N. Your task is to find the smallest prime number that is greater than N.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print a single integer, the smallest prime number greater than N.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
10

Sample Output
11

Explanation:
11 is the smallest prime greater than 10.
hintsList: Start from n+1 and check each number for primality using trial division up to sqrt(number).
